summary: Ole, while working at a fish plant in Duluth, accidentally severs all his fingers.  He goes to the emergency room where a doctor expresses surprise at Ole's lack of fingers, given the advancements in microsurgery. Ole's response highlights the absurdity of the situation.

locations.name: fish plant
locations.context: where Ole works and has his accident

key_events: Ole cuts off all his fingers at a fish plant.
He visits the emergency room of a clinic.
The doctor is surprised Ole did not bring his severed fingers.
Ole questions how he was supposed to retrieve them.
quotes: Let's have da finkers and I'll see what I can do.
Vhat do you mean, you hafen't got da finkers?
How da heck vas I suppose to pick dem up?
